description:
This co2 inflator head is perfect for a quick fix on the trail. It cleverly stores inside Crank Brothers KLIC series pumps. Just screw a CO2 cylinder all the way in to the head, seat the head on the presta valve, then unscrew the cylinder a quarter turn to release the air.

  • Stores inside Crank Brothers KLIC series pumps
  • Compatible with presta valves
  • Includes 2 CO2 cylinders
name: Crankbrothers Klic Pump Inflator Head with 2 CO2 16g Cartridge
